law.text:
The Board shall administer benefits as provided under this subtitle to an individual who, while an inmate in the Patuxent Institution, the Baltimore City Detention Center, or a correctional facility in the Division of Correction:
was engaged in work for which wages or a stipulated sum of money was paid by a correctional facility; and
sustained a permanent partial disability or permanent total disability:
as a result of a personal injury arising out of and in the course of work for which wages or a stipulated sum of money was paid by a correctional facility; and
that incapacitated the individual or materially reduced the individual's earning power in that type of work.
